# Aldori Alacrity (Spell)

[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]
**Level:** [[2nd Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 2]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Magus Spells|Magus 2]]
**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]
**Casting Time:** 1 standard action
**Components:** V, S, M (ginger root shavings)
**Range:** Personal
**Target:** You
**Duration:** 1 minute/level
**Saving Throw:** None
**Spell Resistance:** No
**Source:** Adventurer's Guide, pg. 27

This spellâ€™s energy quickens your steps, allowing fancy footwork. You gain a +10-foot enhancement bonus to your speed and a +1 dodge bonus to your AC. These bonuses do not stack with those granted by *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]* or similar effects. While under the effects of *Aldori alacrity*, you can take 5-foot steps in difficult terrain.

**GM Note**

This spell is sometimes known as *duelist's alacrity.*
